verses.kjv: When the LORD turned again the captivity of Zion, we were like them that dream.
verses.ct: When the LORD restored the fortunes of Zion, it felt like we were dreaming.

verses.kjv: Then was our mouth filled with laughter, and our tongue with singing: then said they among the heathen, The LORD hath done great things for them.
verses.ct: Our mouths were full of laughter, and our tongues shouted with joy. Even the surrounding nations said, 'The LORD has done incredible things for them.'

verses.kjv: The LORD hath done great things for us; whereof we are glad.
verses.ct: The LORD has done incredible things for us, and we are overjoyed.

verses.kjv: Turn again our captivity, O LORD, as the streams in the south.
verses.ct: LORD, restore our fortunes again, like rain filling the dry riverbeds of the Negev.

verses.kjv: They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.
verses.ct: Those who plant their seeds with tears will harvest with shouts of joy.

verses.kjv: He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him.
verses.ct: The one who walks out weeping, carrying seed to sow, will surely return celebrating, carrying bundles of grain.
